Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: Awesome game!It is something different I have ever played before!Characters are very unique\, story is pretty good\, jump scares are real.Atmosphere feels like watching a horror movie and a lot of horror movies that are published these years fail to scare You but this game is doing a great job at scaring You and keeping You wanting to explore everything!
